RangeNormaliser¶

class frlearn.feature_preprocessors.RangeNormaliser[source]¶

Implementation of the range normaliser. Rescales all features by dividing through their total range, ensuring that the values of each feature lie in [-0.5, 0.5].

Notes

If the range of a feature is 0, that feature is left unscaled.

class Model¶
property transform¶
